titleStmt.title: For prevention of many incumbrances and annoyances which daily happen to the streets and passengers, by the irregular and disorderly standing of carrs ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Ward, Patience, Sir, 1629-1696.

notesStmt.note: Title from first two lines of text.
At head of title: Ward mayor. Jovis, v[i]cessimo die Octobr. 1681. Annoque [r]egni Regis Caroli Secundi, Angliæ, &c. tricesim[o] [t]ertio.
Imperfect: creased and torn, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
